data.message: Phase 0: Diagnostics & Trust - Duro Enhancement Implementation: Successfully implemented: 1) _startup_health_check() function in duro_mcp_server.py with 5 checks (sqlite_integrity, index_sync, audit_chain, disk_space, embedding_queue), 2) duro_health_check MCP tool with verbose option, 3) _backup_artifact() method in artifacts.py for backing up before destructive ops, 4) restore_from_backup() and list_backups() helper methods, 5) Updated delete_artifact() to create backups before deletion. All tests pass.
